Pico_Rivera.Mount Zion Cemetery (Los Angeles, Califo:
Mount Zion Cemetery, 1030 S. Downey Road, East Los Angeles, California USA Postal Code: 90023.


== History ==
The Mount Zion Cemetery (opened 1916) property was owned by The Masonic Cemetery Association. It was used by the Jewish Free Burial Society (חברת קדישא החופשית יהודית Chevra Chesid Shel Emeth) when opened.
